Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Northbound Reroute near 95th/Jeffery
ShortDescription: Northbound J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey, 95th, Stony Island, 93rd and Jeffrey due to street blockage near 95th/Jeffery.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey, 95th, Stony Island, 93rd and Jeffrey due to street blockage near 95th/Jeffery.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
